welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kirishima, a charming city known for its breathtaking natural beauty, hot springs, and historic landmarks. Take the time to explore and enjoy all that Kirishima has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 竹亭
restaurants.description: 竹亭 is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 霧島市.
restaurants.address: 隼人町見次1229 (イオン隼人国分店 1F), 霧島市, 鹿児島県, 899-5117

restaurants.name: CoCo Ichibanya (CoCo壱番屋 JS国分店)
restaurants.description: CoCo Ichibanya (CoCo壱番屋 JS国分店) is a japanese curry restaurant located in 霧島市.
restaurants.address: 国分府中町34-20-1, 霧島市, 鹿児島県, 899-4346

restaurants.name: 鹿児島餃子の王将 国分店

restaurants.address: 国分野口東8-47, 霧島市, 鹿児島県, 899-4341

restaurants.name: Marugame Seimen (丸亀製麺 霧島店)

restaurants.address: 国分野口東8-39, 霧島市, 鹿児島県, 899-4341
